src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] RC : Well , shall we go and eat ? [MASK] LP : I think ... [MASK] LP : It 's my first time here and I 'm a bit lost , I 'd like to find ... I think I need to go to the toilet before starting because afterwards I have an appointment with the doctor . Could you tell me ... I must use informal register . Could you , could you tell me how to find the toilets , please ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] ARI : Can I help you ? [MASK] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? [MASK] RC : So we 'd like to go and eat , is there a cafeteria here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : And how do we get there ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Ok. [MASK] RC : Before we go to the cafeteria , I 'd like to go to the toilet . Where are the toilets ? [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] RC : So what do we do , shall we go ? [MASK] [end] LP : I really need to go to the toilet . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : I did n't understand your request , could you rephrase it ? # r-paraph ( request ( location ( toilet ) ) ARI : How can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) RC : We would like to go to the toilets . # request ( location ( toilet ) ) LP : Could you please come with me to the toilets ? # request ( guide-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LP : I would like to go to the toilet . # request ( location ( toilet ) )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LC : What time is it , please ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't know the answer . [MASK] LC : Yeah , well it 's not much . [MASK] RP : Is there a reception for people who have an appointment like me ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Can we have a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . [MASK] LC : Can we have a coffee while we wait ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RP : Do you know the price of a coffee ? [MASK] [end] ARI : No . Sorry , I do n't have this information . # disaffirm ( ) ; cant-help ( ) LC : Is the coffee from a vending machine or a cafeteria ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Go ahead . ARI : Can I help you ? # offer-help ( ) RP : I can ask ... # incomplete-da ( ) RP : Is the cafeteria open at this time ? It 's 6 PM , is the cafeteria still open ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ( ) ) ARI : No . The cafeteria is open from 11 AM to 3 PM . # disaffirm ( ) ; inform ( cafe ( opening_times ) )

src: [start] ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? [MASK] RC : Well , um , we 'd like to go to room 17 for an appointment . Where is ... Which way should we go to get to room 17 ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] LP : Do you think he 's going to take us to room 17 ? Because it looks like he 's stuck here . RC : Oh , I think so . Room 17 ... [MASK] LP : How could we ask him ? RC : It is room 17 that you 're showing us to ? ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : So everything 's fine , we can go . We have an appointment in 5 minutes , do we have time to go there ? ARI : Yes , of course . [MASK] [end] LP : Yes , my friend has forgotten his appointment time . He ca n't remember the doctor 's name either , can you help us please ? Will he ever move ? # request ( appt ( time ) ) ; request ( doctor ( name ) ) ARI : I 'm going to call a nurse to come and inform you . Do you have any other questions ? # call-nurse ( ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : We 'll wait for the nurse . ARI : Yes . # acknowledge ( ) ARI : Thank you , goodbye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RC : Goodbye . # bye ( )

[MASK] RC : Can I sit somewhere with my husband while I wait ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] LP : I have an appointment at 12.30 PM , is it going ahead ? I 'm not late or too early ? src: [start] LP : Well , yeah , but you do what you want . LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? [MASK] RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . [MASK] RC : What time is the appointment ? [MASK] RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . [MASK] ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : That 's a shame . [MASK] LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Is it right or left ? LP : Is there a reception at the hospital ? [MASK] RC : Yes , I think so . [MASK] RC : Where is the reception ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Where do I go for information ? [MASK] LP : I 'd like a coffee . [MASK] RC : Where is the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] LP : How do we get to the ground floor ? [MASK] RC : How do we get to the ground floor ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Which floor is the cafeteria on ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : Where is the cafeteria ? First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . # inform ( appt ( general_info ) ) RC : Yes , but at what time ? # affirm ( ) ; request ( appt ( time ) ) ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LP : I was told that there was a lift in the hospital to get to the next floor . src: LC : Well , the treatment was , well the appointment was very quick . I 'd love a coffee now . Do you know where I could get one ? # request ( beverage ( coffee ) ) [start] RP : Um hello , we 'd like a coffee . Can you please tell us where to go to get a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] RP : Ok , well thank you very much . [MASK] LC : So we 'll take the lift back down , is that right ? [MASK] RP : Do you have to take the lift to go back down ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , of course . src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . [start] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Where can I get information ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Ok , I 'm going to ask you a question ARI . [MASK] LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . ARI : No . [MASK] [end] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . src: LC : I 'd prefer a hot chocolate . # request ( beverage ( hot_chocolate ) ) RP : And why not herbal tea ? # suggest ( requesting ( beverage ( herbal_tea ) ) ) LC : Well , yes . # accept-sugg ( requesting ( beverage ( herbal_tea ) ) ) [start] RP : To de-stress . [MASK] RP : Could we have a hot drink to relax a bit ? We 're a little bit annoyed , stressed out from all of this . The hospital is complicated , is n't it ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , there 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] RP : Well , great , thank you . [MASK] LC : I see a sign , but I do n't know what it means . RP : Ah . LC : Is it a round trip ? RP : Ah , ah , yes . RP : How do we get to the ground floor , do we take the lift ? How do we do it ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , the lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] RP : Ah great , thank you . [MASK] [end] RP : Goodbye . # bye ( ) ARI : You 're welcome . RP : We do n't need you anymore , goodbye . # bye ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you later , have a nice day . # bye ( ) RP : Great , well , we 're done .
